definitions.definition: meat from the back or sides of a pig that has been cured (= preserved using salt or smoke), usually served in thin slices

examples.text: I'll have two rashers of bacon and a fried egg.
A whole side of bacon was hanging from a hook on the ceiling.

definitions.definition: to be successful at something; to earn money for your family to live on

examples.text: His friends had all gone to college or were bringing home the bacon.

definitions.definition: to rescue somebody from a very difficult situation

examples.text: He's out to save his own political neck.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old French, from a Germanic word meaning ‘ham, flitch’; related to back.
